member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [metadata extracted].

member.summary: The metadata key for a int typed value to retrieve the information about whether the media is an advertisement.

member.summary: The metadata key for a CharSequence or string typed value to retrieve the information about the Album title for the media.

member.summary: The metadata key for a Bitmap typed value to retrieve the information about the artwork for the Album of the media's original source.

member.summary: The metadata key for a CharSequence or string typed value to retrieve the information about the artist for the Album of the media's original source.

member.summary: The metadata key for a CharSequence or string typed value to retrieve the information about the Uri of the artwork for the Album of the media's original source.

member.summary: The metadata key for a Bitmap typed value to retrieve the information about the artwork for the media.

member.name: P:ZPF.Media.IMediaItem.Artist
member.summary: The metadata key for a CharSequence or string typed value to retrieve the information about the artist of the media.

member.name: P:ZPF.Media.IMediaItem.ArtUri
member.summary: The metadata key for a CharSequence or string typed value to retrieve the information about Uri of the artwork for the media.

member.summary: The metadata key for a int typed value to retrieve the information about the disc number for the media's original source.

member.name: P:ZPF.Media.IMediaItem.DisplayDescription
member.summary: The metadata key for a CharSequence or string typed value to retrieve the information about the description that is suitable for display to the user.

member.name: P:ZPF.Media.IMediaItem.DisplayIcon
member.summary: The metadata key for a Bitmap typed value to retrieve the information about the icon or thumbnail that is suitable for display to the user.

member.name: P:ZPF.Media.IMediaItem.DisplayIconUri
member.summary: The metadata key for a CharSequence or string typed value to retrieve the information about the Uri of icon or thumbnail that is suitable for display to the user.

member.summary: The metadata key for a CharSequence or string typed value to retrieve the information about the title that is suitable for display to the user.

member.name: P:ZPF.Media.IMediaItem.DownloadStatus
member.summary: The metadata key for a int typed value to retrieve the information about the download status of the media which will be used for later offline playback.

member.name: P:ZPF.Media.IMediaItem.Duration
member.summary: The metadata key for a int typed value to retrieve the information about the duration of the media in ms.

member.name: P:ZPF.Media.IMediaItem.Extras
member.summary: A Bundle extra.

member.summary: The metadata key for a CharSequence or string typed value to retrieve the information about the genre of the media.

member.summary: The metadata key for a CharSequence or string typed value to retrieve the information about the media ID of the content.

member.summary: The metadata key for a CharSequence or string typed value to retrieve the information about the Uri of the content.

member.summary: The metadata key for a CharSequence or string typed value to retrieve the information about the writer of the media.

member.summary: The metadata key for a int typed value to retrieve the information about the year the media was created or published.

member.summary: The file extension of the media item This may not be available for every item

member.name: P:ZPF.Media.IMediaItem.MediaLocation
member.summary: The location of the media item Standard location is Default which will make a guess based on the URI.

member.summary: Gets the buffered time

member.summary: Starts playing

member.summary: Stops playing but retains position

member.summary: Stops playing

member.summary: Changes position to the specified number of milliseconds from zero

member.summary: Seeks forward a fixed amount of seconds of the current MediaItem

member.name: M:ZPF.Media.IMediaPlayer.StepBackward
member.summary: Seeks backward a fixed amount of seconds of the current MediaItem

member.name: P:ZPF.Media.IMediaPlayer.Volume
member.summary: Get or sets the audio volume for media playback. The range is between 0 and 1. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:ZPF.Media.IMediaPlayer.Balance
member.summary: Gets or sets a ratio of volume across stereo speakers. The ratio of volume across speakers in the range between -1 and 1. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:ZPF.Media.IMediaPlayer.Muted
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating if the audio is muted.
